rows.label: qst630407_msg0001
rows.name:
It ain't much, but you got the gratitude
of this old mercenary.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0002
rows.name:
Hopefully Bonard's at rest now he's
been avenged.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0003
rows.name:
He's got a kid back home. Ondina. 
Well, I say kid, but she's all grown up.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0004
rows.name:
He kept sayin' his little girl was gettin'
married soon. That he had to get home
to her, no matter what.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0005
rows.name:
Seems like the worst kind of irony. 
Here's a guy that's seen more than his
share of battles and pulled through...

rows.label: qst630407_msg0006
rows.name:
And this time round, when it mattered
more than ever before, he's not gonna
be comin' home.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0007
rows.name:
...About time for us to head back to
Invidia, I guess.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0008
rows.name:
This mission's over, but I still gotta 
take the news to Ondina.

rows.label: qst630407_msg0009
rows.name:
Don't mention anything if you run in
to her. She deserves to hear it from me.
